entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance optimization in StreamPipeReader makes IsCompleted false if data buffered but at the end of the Stream #87984
  • NativeRuntimeEventSource behaves inconsistently for LogAlways #87983
    8.0.0
  • DotnetRuntime provider needs to handle WCHAR strings #87978
    8.0.0
  • The regular expression does not return a greedy result. #87976
  • .NET framework 4.8.1 TLS 1.3 incompatible with .NET 6 TLS 1.3, presumably other versions #87975
  • learn: how to implement a client of the event based asynchronous pattern throws a platform not supported exception #87974
  • Make limsquic load failures actionable #87970
    8.0.0
  • Decoder ran into invalid data #87965
  • Frozen collection construction performance #87964
    8.0.0
  • _marshal_task_to_cs calls complete_task on already completed task #87963
  • ILC fails to initialize native object writer with path containing '../' #87961
  • `runtime-staging` pipeline running on PRs #87958
  • [HttpStress] massive cancellation errors in HTTP/3 #87957
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Composing and decomposing integers from/to smaller sizes #87954
  • LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests crashed in CI #87951

Closed

  • Extract interface IReadOnlyStream in System.IO.Stream #80368
  • [crossgen2] Lazy string optimization #48580
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Last-use copy elision does not handle IR created by physical promotion #87471
    8.0.0
  • Missing timezone version 6.0.18 #87973
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_72133/Runtime_72133/Runtime_72133.dll #87888
    8.0.0
  • Reliable No GC Region #37667
    8.0.0
  • Json source generator generates uncompilable code for new .NET Framework project #83392
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Matrix4x4.CreateViewport #79961
    8.0.0
  • Adding Request-Id header breaks distributed tracing on .NET Full Framework #87827
  • TLS handshake fails on HttpClient, but works on WebRequest #87571
  • NativeAOT type instantiation sharing #83318
    Future
  • [API Proposal] QuicError.AcceptConnectionFailed #75184
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Native.Android-static is braking JNI libs compiled with NativeAOT. #72556
    Future
  • [HttpStress] massive timeouts around HTTP/3 stress test startup #77126
    8.0.0
  • Minimizing size of Dotnet WebAssembly Browser app #87617
    8.0.0
  • Delete support for Marshal.GetTypeFromCLSID #72914
    Future
  • Ban SR.GetResourceString #81338
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2208423 #87991
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Avoid prefer-ing gsharedvt versions of AsyncMethodBuilder… #87990
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Port FrozenDictionary's length bucket optimizations to FrozenSet #87989
    area-System.Collections
  • Remove optimizeForReading overloads from FrozenDictionary/Set #87988
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable scoped parameters in signatures of source-generated interop methods #87987
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix UnsafeAccessors with Relocs #87986
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot] Build host bits when targeting iOS platforms with Native AOT #87985
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • ZipArchive now disposes given stream only once #87982
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Document new STJ diagnostics and fix diagnostic id conflicts. #87980
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug changes #87979
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid leaking committed bytes for large pages #87977
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` locales covering `LocaleStringData`. #87972
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [HTTP/3] Fix handling cancelation during QUIC connection establishment #87971
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [System.Numerics] Cross Product for Vector2 and Vector4 #87968
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Stop setting class handles for promoted parameter SIMD fields #87967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing a concurrency bug in ManagedWebSocket which may cause memory corruption #87966
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Resolve path before initializing objwriter #87962
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Add ConfigurationExtensions tests to NativeAOT exclusions #87955
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add AddHttpClientDefaults #87953
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [IGNORE][wasm] refactoring wbt a bit #87952
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Matrix4x4.CreateViewport #87748
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Insert writebacks more eagerly #87869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a size component to the physical promotion heuristic #87969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle GT_FTN_ADDR in gtClone #87942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TargetOS::IsMacOS was not properly handled on X64 #87940
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Make HTTP and WS clients work #87567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add unsupported language detection to the STJ source generator #87950
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (4/n) #87876
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Add span-based static Create overloads for immutable collections #87945
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (5/n) #87960
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Add timeouts to SendRecv_Stream_TCP_MultipleConcurrentReceives #87943
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2207912 #87948
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Fix constant preparing for shuffle stub #87708
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Delete CLSID cruft from reflection #87907
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove uses of SR.GetResourceString throughout the libs #87912
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Type equivalence support in Crossgen2 #87899
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Speed up KeyAnalyser #87590
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Complete interp PackedSimd support and expand jiterp support #87903
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion #87917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] CI for running wbt with multithreaded runtime #87895
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • JIT: don't set edge weights to zero for inconsistent profiles #87947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • RemoveDirectoryRecursive: fix delete of mount points #86918
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Allow unnecessary [In, Out] attributes on blittable arrays and report them as unnecessary #87774
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Auto generate Event Ids in the logging source gen #87892
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Add BinaryData.ContentType #87744
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] ILStrip sorts custom attribute table #87933
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add IStartupHostedService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix `--make-repro-path` handling of "ILLinker compatible" parameters #87909
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • Fix invalid datetimeoffset parsing #87801
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add support for including System.Index and System.Range downlevel within dotnet/runtime #87840
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement casing functions #87919
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Enable reading process environment variables in EventPipe #87771
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use config binding generator in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Configuration assembly #87935
    area-Extensions-Logging, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #87770
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • throw SocketException for Quic transport errors #87208
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema and output layout #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Revert msquic hack in stress tests #87926
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Fix GenericPInvokeCalliHelper arg #87928
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt+sdk #87345
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot build/restore maccatalyst targeting .net6 due to missing package #33530
  • Task.Delay(Timeout.Infinite, cancellationToken) does not return when cancellation is requested #33527

Closed

  • NuGet package reference is broken when PackageId is set by a props file in a NuGet package. #33528

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.4xx] Containers release notes #33537
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] containers: split `Registry.cs` and made it testable #33536
    Area-Containers

Merged

  • Support setting workload set versions in global.json #33441
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/7.0.4xx] implemented logging using `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` in containers #33501
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Containers: prefer atomic layer upload and auth fixes #33500
    Area-Containers
  • Add a unique error message when workloads are disabled but a customer is trying to use workloads #33406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--disable-build-servers` to Run and Store CLI commands #33445
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Containers: prefer atomic layer upload #33336
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 7.0.10
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Debug Console" doesn't seem to support spans with slices #68753
  • ExportCodeFixProviderAttribute should be marked as `Inherted = false` #68751
  • LSIF indexing performance degraded #68750
  • ILVerification fails unexpectedly on method group conversion using extension method #68749
    C# 12.0
  • ObservableProperty breaks ExtractInterfaceCodeRefactoringProvider #68748
  • IDE0059 should not trigger when fixing it triggers BC42104 #68746
  • The `language` property of the SARIF file should be output correctly #68745
  • C# DevKit complains about ref structs #68742

Closed

  • Intellisense not work with interface #68594

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection literals: remove DictionaryElementSyntax #68752
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • "Fix" LSP semantic token modifiers #68744
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Rename CollectionCreationExpression to CollectionExpression #68747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix collection literal parsing at the state of a statement expression. #68737
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Return correctly formatted URIs for file watching #68741
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68635
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Collection literals: type inference #68703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Publish additional package for razor testing #68725
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Don't expose MS.VS.LanguageServer.Protocol types from EA.Razor #68713
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Crossgen for .NET 8 #68721
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes - post VS2019.md #68674
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • EnC: Implement support for editing types with primary constructors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Fix assert when using `__arglist` and `in` arguments together #68726
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Readonly References, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #48997
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #48996
  • System.TypeInitializationException thrown in Blazor WASM with a certain type layout #48995
  • Scroll doesn't work when calling NavigationManager.NavigateTo() same url with query and hash #48993
    8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Internally pass strings from JS to Blazor as a Uint8Array #48992
  • Blazor route parameter using UrlEncode will remove any + (plus) signs #48989
  • Blazor ServerApp does not follow wwwroot/* Symlinks #48986
  • Router's NotFound content is never used in new Web project style #48983
  • Generated swagger/redoc page doesn't respect inherited descriptions #48982
  • Debugging Blazor WASM in VS2022 not work with 7.0.8 #48985

Closed

  • Don't warn on `app.UseEndpoints(e => {});` in RouteHandlerAnalyzer #46270
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Make `ComponentState` methods `public` #48980
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, mvc #48959
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #48979
  • How to automatically install the .NET SDK version specified in global.json when running restore.cmd? #48919
  • Perf regression: plaintext #48973

PullRequests

Created

  • Update minimal APIs form binding integration #48999
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Bug hash routing same page with query #48994
    area-blazor
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, .NET 8.0
  • [Blazor] Form mapping error handling and validation integration for SSR Blazor #48990
    area-blazor
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `d60cf22` to `b239fb5` #48987
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine UnauthorizedDirectWebSocketsConnectionDoesNotConnect #48981
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Don't warn on `app.UseEndpoints(e => {});` #48977
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7
  • Callsite rendermodes #48967
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `18fa6a4` to `ec4fed9` #48988
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • [skip-ci] Add missing xml docs for ExceptionHandler #48814
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Implement ITlsHandshakeFeature in IIS #48957
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7
  • Update SDK #48908
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2208188 #48970
    area-mvc
  • [blazor] Set Cross-Origin-Policy headers for multi-threaded runtime #47855
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Remove hosted from blazor wasm templates descriptions #48969
    area-mvc, area-blazor
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security
  • Remove IIS settings from Core API template. #48821
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Shell page Unloaded event fires when returning to it from another tab #15833
  • [8.0.0-preview.5.8529] [Android] DeviceSensors produce an ANR at irregular intervals when built in Release mode. #15829
  • Button.LineBreakMode does not work on Windows #15828
  • Changing FlyoutItem Title causes Title to disappear #15827
  • [Android] [.Net 8] ListView doesn't get rendered #15826
    .NET 8
  • iOS: CollectionView - Horizontal CollectionView does not show the last element under some conditions #15815
  • CollectionView with non integer height request has atrocious scroll performance #15814
  • Shell.BackButtonBehavior doesn't react to swipe back #15813
    Backlog
  • Strange file picker behavior when using BlazorWebView #15812
  • TapGestureRecognizer Tapped events not worked in Windows Platform #15810
    .NET 8
  • CollectionView pushes content below it off the screen on macOS and iOS #15809
  • CollectionView not showing correctly inside AbsoluteLayout in iOS #15808
  • RadioButton Border color not working for focused visual state #15806
    Backlog
  • DatePicker Focused color not applied after date selection #15805
  • Picker selected item text color changes on mouse hover #15804
  • Maui Connectivity Change from Online to Offline to Online Connectivity.NetworkAccess == Unknown on Windows 10 #15803
  • Windows FontRegistrar assumes MSIX packaging #15802

Closed

  • Compiling a simple, basic, barebones Maui Xaml file (App.xaml.cs located in Platform -> Windows folder) that uses a minimal custom IMarkupExtension Fails to Compile, giving the Error, XamlCompiler error WMC0015: Cannot assign 'StringResourceXamlMarkupExtension' into property 'Text', type must be assignable to 'String' #15775
  • Corrupt aapt_rules.txt when Creating a Package per Abi on Android #15800
  • OnPlatform x:TypeArguments does not support Default case #15715
  • Android Button (maybe other controls) problem #13483
    Backlog
  • OnPlatform Xaml Syntax does not support AppThemeBinding #15716
  • DisplayPromptAsync: introduce a parameter for hiding the entered text (e.g. password) #15817
  • OnNightModeChanged Android not functional #7877
    Backlog
  • Missing Buttons-Property in TapGestureRecognizer-Control #12815
    Backlog
  • [Android] Issues with swiping at the bottom of a ScrollView w/ TalkBack #14186
    Backlog
  • [Android] Inconsistent first TalkBack focus on navigating to new page #14187
    Backlog
  • OnNavigatedTo and OnAppearing not being called #14284
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI targeting Windows does not show/display #14309
  • CollectionView and ScrollView on iOS don't decelerate with fling gesture. #15580
    Backlog
  • CollectionView scrollts content behind TitleBar (can't scroll down enough) on some devices #14149
  • Windows HorizontalList CollectionView has some weird space if cells are smaller than 88 dp #15241
    .NET 8

PullRequests

Created

  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Add logic to set DefaultLabelPosition on the WinUI CommandBar #15835
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue setting ContentPage gradient background #15832
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • [ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells #15831
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • [uitests] Fix uitests pipelines triggers for Compatibility tests #15830
    area/testing
  • Bump GtkSharp from 3.24.24.34 to 3.24.24.95 #15818
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 7.0.7 to 7.0.8 #15823
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix Button issue updating background brush type #15725
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [GraphicsTester] only build for maccatalyst-x64 #15798
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15801
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • [CI] Remove nested templates in the running steps. #15797
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Streamline ModalNavigation lifecycle events #15799
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #15777
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
